title: Organic Lavender Shampoo
description: A soothing and nourishing shampoo infused with organic lavender essential oil. Gently cleanses the hair while promoting relaxation.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Sensitive Skin Face Cream
description: A gentle face cream formulated for sensitive skin. Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic.
instructions: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck. Use morning and night.

title: Metal Nail Polish
description: A non-toxic nail polish free from harmful metals like lead and nickel. Available in vibrant shades.
instructions: Apply two coats for best results.

title: Radiant Glow Serum
description: Revitalize your skin with this illuminating serum.
instructions: Apply morning and night after cleansing.

title: Silky Smooth Hair Oil
description: Nourish and tame frizz with this luxurious hair oil.
instructions: Apply a few drops to damp or dry hair.

title: ClearSkin Acne Serum
description: Target stubborn acne with this powerful serum.
instructions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin before moisturizing.

title: Latex-Infused Firming Mask
description: Experience the lifting effect of natural latex in this firming mask.
instructions: Apply a thin layer, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 10 minutes and rinse thoroughly.

title: LuxeLocks Shampoo
description: A luxurious sulfate-free shampoo infused with argan oil and keratin for smooth, shiny hair.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: SilkGlow Conditioner
description: A nourishing conditioner enriched with silk proteins and vitamin E for silky-smooth strands.
instructions: Apply to damp hair after shampooing, leave for 2 minutes, and rinse.

title: ReviveRoots Hair Mask
description: An intensive hair mask infused with avocado oil and shea butter to revive dry, damaged hair.
instructions: Apply to clean, towel-dried hair, leave for 10 minutes, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Beard Oil
description: A nourishing blend of argan oil, jojoba oil, and cedarwood essential oil to soften and condition your beard.
instructions: Apply a few drops to your beard daily and massage gently.

title: Beard Balm
description: A styling balm enriched with shea butter, beeswax, and eucalyptus oil for shaping and taming unruly beards.
instructions: Rub a small amount between your palms and apply to your beard for styling.

title: Beard Wash
description: A gentle beard wash infused with chamomile and aloe vera to cleanse without stripping natural oils.
instructions: Wet your beard, apply a small amount of wash, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Oil-Control Cleanser
description: A salicylic acid cleanser that gently removes excess oil without over-drying.
instructions: Use daily to keep skin clear and matte.

title: Matte Moisturizer with SPF
description: Lightweight moisturizer with sun protection. Controls shine and prevents breakouts.
instructions: Apply in the morning after cleansing.

title: Acne-Fighting Clay Mask
description: Sulfur clay mask that absorbs excess oil and minimizes pores.
instructions: Use twice a week for best results.

title: Hydrating Cleanser
description: Gentle cleanser with ceramides and hyaluronic acid to nourish and hydrate dry skin.
instructions: Use morning and night.

title: Rich Moisturizing Cream
description: Barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Face Cream for intense hydration.
instructions: Apply generously to face and neck.

title: Gentle Body Lotion
description: Rapid Relief Restoring Lotion with alpha-hydroxy acids for soft, smooth skin.
instructions: Use daily after shower

title: Bubblegum Bliss Moisturizer
description: Experience the sweet scent of bubblegum while keeping your skin hydrated. Our moisturizer is infused with imaginary bubblegum extract for a whimsical touch.
instructions: Apply a dollop of Bubblegum Bliss Moisturizer to your face and pretend you're blowing bubblegum bubbles!

title: Unicorn Tears Serum
description: Harness the magical power of unicorn tears! Our serum promises to make your skin glow like a mythical creature.
instructions: Apply Unicorn Tears Serum to your face while chanting, "Sparkle, sparkle, magical glow!"

title: Zombie Apocalypse Exfoliator
description: Scrub away dead skin cells with our spooky exfoliator. Contains crushed zombie bones (not really).
instructions: Apply Zombie Apocalypse Exfoliator in circular motions and pretend you're battling zombies.
